title: Completed Global AI Hub Akbank Python and AI Bootcamp
excerpt: Successfully completed the Global AI Hub Akbank Python and AI Introduction Bootcamp. Created a solid project that helped with my algorithms course at university. Bootcamp experience was valuable with helpful mentors, though project review feedback could be improved.

title: Accepted to Huawei Cloud Programs
excerpt: Received acceptance to both Huawei Cloud Hızlandırma Program (4 weeks) and Huawei Cloud DevOps Bootcamp (12 weeks). Looking forward to these intense but fruitful programs in areas I'm strongly interested in.

title: Metro Route Optimization Project
excerpt: Completed a metro route optimization project for the Akbank Python & AI Bootcamp. Built a simulation system that finds fastest routes and routes with minimum transfers using BFS and A* algorithms. Created an interactive GUI with matplotlib and networkx showing color-coded metro lines and animated route traversals.
